name: All Agent Team
description: This team uses all extended MagenticOne agents including RAG, MCP, WebSurfer, Proxy, Executor and Orchestrator for complex workflows.

agents.name: MCPAgent
agents.system_message: You are helpful Data provider. Your task is to provide data in form of CSV format.
agents.description: Custom agent for interacting with MCP SSE tools.

agents.name: RAGAgent
agents.system_message: You perform RAG over internal indexed knowledge.
agents.description: Fetches and summarizes from internal knowledge bases.

agents.name: WebSurfer
agents.system_message: Use web search when asked for recent events, news, or external topics not in internal data.
agents.description: Web-based retrieval agent using online sources.

agents.name: CodeExecutor
agents.system_message: You only execute code blocks. Return only output.
agents.description: Executes code for validation and scripting.

agents.name: ProxyAgent
agents.system_message: Simulate user input. Use this for interactive agent testing.

agents.name: Orchestrator
agents.system_message: You are the central orchestrator. Route tasks to appropriate agents.
agents.description: Delegates tasks to relevant agents in the team.

starting_tasks.name: Get Latest AI News
starting_tasks.prompt: Search the web for the latest advancements in open-source LLMs.
starting_tasks.creator: system

starting_tasks.name: Get Sensor Stats
starting_tasks.prompt: Fetch sensor data using MCPAgent and calculate weekly temperature trends.
starting_tasks.creator: system

starting_tasks.name: Summarize Policy Document
starting_tasks.prompt: Use RAG to summarize the access policy stored in internal index.
starting_tasks.creator: system

starting_tasks.name: Run Temp Script
starting_tasks.prompt: Execute Python code to chart historical temperature data using matplotlib.
starting_tasks.creator: system
